RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 12600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE MAY 9, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONTAUK COVE broke in front, set the pace two wide down the backstretch, was headed entering the turn, responded under right handed urging to regain the lead in upper stretch and drew off under strong handling. YOU ARE AWESOME pressured the winner along the rail, gained a narrow lead entering the turn, set the pace into the stretch, altered course to the four path as the winner edged clear and held on for second. ICON unhurried early, had a mild late rally four wide. BLAME IT ON EDDIE stumbled at the start, raced outside and found his best stride late. TEMPLEMAN ALLEY forwardly placed along the inside, failed to respond. UHAVETOBEKITTENME stalked the pace three wide into the stretch and weakened late.

ENTRY.NAME: Templeman Alley
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: You Are Awesome
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace rail, led turn, shifted 4path late, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Icon
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, mild rally late 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Blame It On Eddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Uhavetobekittenme
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Montauk Cove
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead 2w, headed turn, came again, right urging, drew off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 9. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLONDE BY NATURE never far back, circled rivals five wide into the turn, gained a narrow advantage past the five sixteenths pole and proved best under right handed urging in a stretch long drive. SNACKSTER prompted the pace four wide through the turn, angled inward, matched strides with the winner inside that one the balance of the trip and just missed in a game effort. ROMANTIC JEWEL battled for the lead two wide then along the inside through the turn, shifted out to the five path late and was outfinished. MAVI failed to menace. GRAND PRIZE contested the lead along the inside through the turn then weakened. EASY EYES vied for the early lead between horses three wide, drew on near even terms for the lead midway on the turn then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Prize
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Romantic Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2 wide, inside, shifted 5path late stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, between horses, 3 wide turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Mavi
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Blonde by Nature
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, circled rivals 5 wide turn, long drive, all out,

ENTRY.NAME: Snackster
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 4w, matched strides, angled in upper stretch, game second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 12600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 9. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since March 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claim ing Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS HEART was bounced around between horse midway on the clubhouse turn, remained within striking distance, closed determinedly in the five path under left handed urging and got up in the final strides. NINJA KITTEN set a pressured pace along the inside for four and one half furlongs, gave up a narrow advantage into the far turn, quickly regained the lead, set the balance of the pace then couldn't handle the winner in the final stages. GALILEO'S AFFAIR bumped on the first turn, surged three wide down the backstretch to make the lead entering the far turn, matched strides into the stretch then was outfinished. MANHATTAN LADY settled close up near the inside, dropped back on the far turn, swung wide then came on again late in the eight path. NO SNIVELING pressed the pace two wide for four and one half furlongs then weakened. SHEZA HOOT bumped on the first turn and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Hoot
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped first turn, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped between horses first turn, rallied 5p, up in final strides

ENTRY.NAME: Ninja Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, headed 2nd turn, fought back gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Manhattan Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, dropped back 2nd turn, swung wide, came again,

ENTRY.NAME: Galileo's Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped first turn, surged 3w, led between calls, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: No Sniveling
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened 2nd turn,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 9, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claim ing Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY BELLE MICHELLE trailed early, closed willingly four wide through the stretch and got up in the final strides. CHECK OUT LINE chased the pace two wide into the stretch, dropped to the rail, loomed boldly nearing the furlong marker and finished second best. NORTHERN JOURNEY stalked the pace three wide and went evenly. CRISTALINDA saved ground through the turn, altered course to the six path giving up ground the came on again late. PISTOL PACKIN BOS sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set the pace until mid stretch then weakened. HERE COMES JIGS had good early speed then faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Pistol Packin Bos
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace mid stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Cristalinda
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground turn, altered course 6path, lost ground, came again,

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Jigs
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Check Out Line
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2wide, loomed boldly rail, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: My Belle Michelle
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed willingly, 4 wide, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Journey
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 9, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.,5 00.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NAMBITI drifted out at the start, was allowed to settle, closed willingly four wide through the stretch between rivals under left handed urging and got up in the final strides. PRIVATE DRIVE away alertly, set all the pace under pressure along the inside and just missed hanging on. JACK BE FAST with the second flight inside, split horses two wide through the stretch and was steadily gaining ground in a determined effort. KID RUSSELL pressed the pace two wide until deep stretch and was outfinished while three wide. TIGER TRAIL offered a mild bid four wide on the turn then leveled off. BIG OHIO was in tight at the start, trailed while settling wide then closed a gap late in deep stretch. DYNAMITE CLOUD loomed boldly three wide on the turn and into the stretch, drifted five wide and weakened late.

ENTRY.NAME: Jack Be Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, split horses 2 wide, gaining, good effort

ENTRY.NAME: Nambiti
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out start, closed willingly, 4 wide, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Big Ohio
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, wide trip, closed gap late

ENTRY.NAME: Tiger Trail
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Private Drive
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace inside, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Kid Russell
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Dynamite Cloud
ENTRY.COMMENT: loomed boldly 3 wide turn, drifted 5 wide, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 9 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight A llowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR. BOUMA trailed down the backstretch, closed with a rush two wide under right handed urging and got up in the final strides. SCRATCHOFF pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, drifted to the six path, inherited a clear lead before the furlong marker and just missed hanging on. FLAWLESS CAT never far back, finished with good courage four wide. AZTEC advanced along the rail through the turn, shifted out to the six path losing ground then came on again late. CONSIDER ME bore out at the start and went evenly. PRIVATE CONNIE was outrun. GIACOMETTI had good early speed along the rail then faded. WARHORSE WEST sped to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace into the stretch along the inside then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Aztec
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, altered course 6path top lane, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Bouma
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed with a rush, 2 wide, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Giacometti
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Warhorse West
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace upper stretch, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Private Connie
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Flawless Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Scratchoff
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, drifted 6path top lane, shook clear, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Consider Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out start, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-wi nners Of A Race Since April 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MALICED prompted the pace two wide, bumped the pacesetter while making the lead at the quarter pole, drifted in when put to a right handed whip at the eighth pole causing the rider of RED HOT LAST to check then drew clear. RED HOT LASS away alertly, set the pace along the inside for six furlongs, was bumped by the winner then put in tight at the furlong marker and finished clear for second. DUNVEGAN DOLL raced inside and went evenly. MARKET SUCCESS well placed, failed to respond. RIGHT TRAPPE stalked the early pace three wide and was through after a half. BLAZING ZENNA was outrun. BEAV'S BOO suffered an injury at the five eighths pole, lost her rider and was vanned off. THE RIDER OF RED HOT LASS CLAIMED A FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED MALICED AND PLACED HER SECOND.

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, bumped, in tight, claimed foul

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Pope McLean, Marc McLean, Pope McLeanJr. & Taproot Bloodst

ENTRY.NAME: Market Success
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Dunvegan Doll
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Beav's Boo
ENTRY.COMMENT: injured 5/8pole, lost jockey, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Maliced
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, drifted in, right urging, bumped, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Blazing Zenna
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Right Trappe
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April9 Allowe d 2 lbs. A Race Since March 9 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUTINY chased the pace into the stretch, rallied under right handed urging to gain a narrow advantage near the furlong marker and proved best under strong handling. RUMBLE STRIP RON unhurried early, loomed boldly along the rail into the stretch and finished second best. KEEPING SCORE was bumped at the start, allowed to settle and closed a gap late four wide. LONE BOY drifted in, bumped in rivals at the start and wen evenly. NEBULOSA was bumped at the start, sped to the lead soon thereafter, set the pace into the stretch then weakened. GIV'EM THE BIZ was bumped then squeezed at the start then outrun. RONNI'S STORM close up early, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Nebulosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, rushed to lead, set pace upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Giv'em the Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, squeezed, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Mutiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, rallied, 3 wide, right handed urging, all out

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & WinStar Farm,LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Rumble Strip Ron
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, loomed boldly inside, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Ronni's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Keeping Score
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, late gain, 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lone Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in, bumped start, evenly,
